data.value: By default, an order 8 Chebyshev type I filter is used. A 30 point FIR filter with Hamming window is used if
keyword was added in 0.18.0. The possibility to use instances of
The signal to be downsampled, as an N-dimensional array.
The downsampling factor. When using IIR downsampling, it is recommended to call
multiple times for downsampling factors higher than 13.
The order of the filter (1 less than the length for 'fir'). Defaults to 8 for 'iir' and 20 times the downsampling factor for 'fir'.
If 'iir' or 'fir', specifies the type of lowpass filter. If an instance of an
object, uses that object to filter before downsampling.
The axis along which to decimate.
Prevent phase shift by filtering with
when using an IIR filter, and shifting the outputs back by the filter's group delay when using an FIR filter. The default value of
is recommended, since a phase shift is generally not desired.
Downsample the signal after applying an anti-aliasing filter.
Resample up or down using the FFT method.
Resample using polyphase filtering and an FIR filter.

signature.value: decimate(x, q, n=None, ftype='iir', axis=-1, zero_phase=True)
